name: Up or Out
description:
Work hard. Or don't.

Years ago, you graduated from a top-tier law school. Life was going to be so good. But years later, you remain crippled by student loan debt.

At least you're up for Partner soon. Two months remain before your boss makes a decision. Until then, do everything in your power to become Partner. (More specifically, slack off and apply for other jobs all day so you never have to see your bloated toad of a boss ever again.)

Work is for Suckers.
  • Manage your email, job search, and workload.
  • Ignore your boss and apply for other jobs.
  • Chat with recruiters behind your boss's back, and try not to get caught.
  • "Carefully review" contracts to pad your hours.

Multiple Paths to Success or Failure.
  • Hundreds of possible LSAT, GPA, and Trait combinations - some random, some up to you.
  • Shape your future and choose your law school, your law firm, and even your boss.
